definition[0]: used to say that you think or hope something is true, when you are not certain
example[0]: I shouldn’t think they’ve gone far.
example[1]: ‘I suppose there’ll be a lot of complaints?’ ‘I should imagine so.’
definition[1]: used to emphasize that you are not surprised by what someone has told you because you have moral reasons to expect it
example[2]: ‘She doesn’t like to hear me swearing.’ ‘I should think not.’
example[3]: ‘He did apologize.’ ‘I should hope so, after the way he behaved.’
